Title: 14. vOilah! France Singapore Festival 2025
Description: 23rd Apr-8th Jun  Image credit: Sing’theatre Celebrating French arts and music is vOilah! France Singapore Festival 2025 . Spanning a couple of weeks, events include: A French Kiss in Singapore – a musical revue featuring classics from France’s songwriters, performed live by local artists Two Rivers – a photography exhibition showcasing the Singapore River and the Siene River Carmen, by Georges Bizet – an adaptation of the classic opera, performed by Singapore Lyric Opera Bambi: A Tale of Life in the Woods – A French film screening at The Projector Admission: Free & paid events Venue: Multiple Dates: 23rd Apr-8th Jun Full list of vOilah! events
